info.name: CollabMedia Capsule Purchase API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for testing CollabMedia Capsule Purchase system including shopping cart, payment processing, order management, and purchase analytics. All endpoints require user authentication with 7-day session timeout. Use the Authentication collection to login first and get session cookies.

item.name: üîç Capsule Discovery & Browsing

request.description: Browse capsules available for purchase in the public gallery. Supports filtering by price range, categories, and tags. Returns paginated list of capsules with pricing and metadata.
Get detailed information about a specific capsule including pricing, content preview, and purchase options. Use this to display capsule details before adding to cart.
Search capsules by keywords, categories, and tags. Supports advanced filtering options for finding relevant capsules to purchase.

item.description: Endpoints for discovering and browsing capsules available for purchase

item.name: üõí Shopping Cart & Purchase

request.description: Complete capsule purchase using Stripe payment processing. Creates personalized capsule instances for each owner. Supports single or multiple owners (gift purchases). Requires valid Stripe token and owner information.
Purchase multiple capsules for multiple owners (bulk/gift purchases). Creates separate capsule instances for each owner. Useful for team purchases or gift giving.

Purchase only specific capsules from cart by providing capsule IDs. Useful when cart has multiple items but user wants to buy only selected ones. Validates that selected capsules exist in cart before processing payment.
Purchase all items in cart (default behavior). No capsule IDs specified - processes all cart items. This is the original behavior maintained for backward compatibility.
Create a special celebrity/influencer instance of a capsule. Used for high-profile purchases or celebrity endorsements with custom branding and personalization.

item.description: Core purchase endpoints for buying capsules and creating instances

item.name: üì¶ Order Management

request.description: Get all capsules purchased by the current user. Includes purchase history, order details, and capsule access information. Supports filtering and pagination.
Get sales data for capsules created by the current user. Includes revenue, buyer information, and sales analytics. Useful for creators to track their earnings.

query.description: Start date for sales data export
End date for sales data export

request.description: Export sales data to Excel format for detailed analysis. Includes buyer information, revenue breakdown, and sales trends. Useful for accounting and business analysis.

item.description: Order management endpoints for tracking purchases and sales

item.name: üë• Buyer Analytics & Management

header.description: ID of the capsule to get buyers for

request.description: Get all users who purchased a specific capsule. Includes buyer details, purchase information, and user profiles. Useful for customer support, marketing, and analytics.
Get complete purchase history for a specific buyer. Useful for customer support and understanding buyer behavior patterns.

item.description: Analytics and management endpoints for understanding buyers and purchase patterns

item.name: üìä Purchase Analytics & Reporting

request.description: Get comprehensive purchase analytics including revenue, sales trends, buyer demographics, and performance metrics. Useful for business intelligence and reporting.
Get detailed revenue breakdown by capsule, including platform commission, taxes, and refunds. Useful for financial reporting and profit analysis.

item.description: Advanced analytics and reporting endpoints for purchase data

item.name: üéÅ Gift & Bulk Purchases

request.description: Purchase a capsule as a gift for someone else. Includes gift message, delivery options, and notification settings. Creates a personalized capsule instance for the gift recipient.
Purchase capsules for multiple team members at once. Includes team discounts, bulk notifications, and admin access options. Useful for corporate training programs.

item.description: Special purchase scenarios for gifts and bulk orders

item.name: üîß Purchase Configuration & Settings

request.description: Get user's purchase preferences and settings including payment methods, billing information, and notification preferences.
Update user's purchase preferences including default payment methods, billing information, and notification settings.

item.description: Configuration endpoints for managing purchase preferences and settings

item.name: üì± Post-Purchase Content Access

request.description: Get all posts from capsules purchased by the user. Includes media content, interactions (likes, comments), and user details. Supports filtering and pagination.

header.description: ID of the capsule to get posts from

request.description: Get posts from a specific purchased capsule. Includes media filtering, keyword search, and interaction data. Useful for accessing capsule content after purchase.

item.description: Endpoints for accessing content after successful purchase
